document_data.name: Iliskar Northwind
document_data.mainbody: '''Illiskar Northwind''' was someone in [[Marsember]] in the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Rumors & Legends: The [[Harper]] [[Roldro Tattershar]] threatened the steward of [[Haelithtorntowers]] manor in [[Marsember]], [[Elward]] with revealing to the Watch the fate of Illiskar Northwind last month in {{yearlink|1373}}, while trying to gain access to [[Joysil Ambrur]], lady of the manor. In doing so, he strongly implied Elward had been involved in an untoward act.
